name: rls_disabled_in_public
title: RLS Disabled in Public
description: Detects cases where row level security (RLS) has not been enabled on tables in schemas exposed to PostgREST
detail: Table \`public.leads\` is public, but RLS has not been enabled.

name: sensitive_columns_exposed
title: Sensitive Columns Exposed
description: Detects tables exposed via API that contain columns with potentially sensitive data (PII, credentials, financial info) without RLS protection.
detail: Table `public.instagram_config` is exposed via API without RLS and contains potentially sensitive column(s): access_token. This may lead to data exposure.
